user.title: Set up AI Automation Suggester
user.description: Choose your AI provider to start generating smart automations.

provider_config.title: Configure Provider
provider_config.description: Enter the API details for your selected provider.

generate_suggestions.name: Generate Suggestions
generate_suggestions.description: Trigger the AI to analyze your smart home. Uses memory to avoid previously rejected suggestions.

temperature.name: Temperature
temperature.description: AI Creativity: 0.1 is best for YAML, 0.7+ is better for ideas.

entity_limit.name: Entity Limit
entity_limit.description: Max number of entities to send to the AI.

all_entities.name: Scan All Entities
all_entities.description: Force a full re-scan of all entities.

domains.name: Filter Domains
domains.description: Only analyze specific domains (e.g. light, switch).

automation_read_yaml.name: Read Existing Automations
automation_read_yaml.description: Allow AI to read your current automations.

save_suggestion.name: Save Suggestion
save_suggestion.description: Saves a suggestion to ai_automations.yaml or blueprints.

suggestion_id.name: Suggestion ID
suggestion_id.description: The unique ID or 'latest_1' / 'latest_2' from the dashboard.

clear_suggestion_history.name: Clear Suggestion History
clear_suggestion_history.description: Wipes the history file and clears the history sensor log.
